thread.section_title: Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A nice little surprise
thread.title_full: A nice little surprise - Review of Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: nadiabettio
title: A nice little surprise
text:
A great surprise! A great hotel nestled among the hutongs! Great location - central to most tourist attractions and subway.
Great customer service and comfy rooms.
Little supermarkets nearby and the lovely lake, tea houses and bars with live music!
Have travelled A LOT and would definitely be going back and recommending to family and friends
Room Tip: Great hotel and customer service. Cheap meals - tasty! Great location and great character! See more room tips
